title: How to invest in gold as bullion surges to record high above $3,700

title: BP Cancels Rotterdam Biofuels Plant, Joining Shell in Heavy Capital Retreat

title: Eni Seals Billion-Dollar Fusion Energy Deal with U.S. Partner
summary: U.S. Commonwealth Fusion Systems (CFS), which is developing fusion energy, has signed a more than $1-billion power purchase agreement with Italy’s energy major Eni as the two companies continue to partner to bring fusion power to commercial use. title: Consumers Face High Bills, States Eye PJM Control

title: Global Nuclear Generation Set for a Slowdown
summary: Global nuclear power generation is on course to decline after a record-breaking 2024 on insufficient investment and aging power plants, the World Nuclear Industry Status Report has warned. title: Trump wields ‘golden share’ to halt U.S. Steel plant shutdown, WSJ reports
summary: The intervention marked Trump's first use of so-called "golden share" rights, a condition of the $14.1 billion takeover cleared in June.
